reviewText: This is a terrible depiction of the band.  They have no affiliation with the group involved and is very amateur.  Don't waste your money!

It is a good TV program and misleading DVD as some rehearsals of popular tunes provided instead full length songs advertised on a jacket.

A doco is of interest to deep funs and interested in rock history mostly.
This is complete rip off.  Metallica nor their music are present in this DVD.  Just a bunch of fat, old, rockers talking about Metallica.
